Song.title: Better Than Life (Bloom)
Song.copyright: Â© Jon Bloom. All rights reserved.

Arrangement.text:
Chorus: Your love is [D]Better than life Your love is [Bm]better than life Your love is [Gmaj7]better than [Gmaj6]life to m[Asus A]e
Your love is [D]Better than life Your love is [Bm]better than life Your love is [Gmaj7]better than [Asus]life to m[D]e [Asus A]
Arrangement.searchtext: chorus your love is better than life your love is better than life your love is better than life to me your love is better than life your love is better than life your love is better than life to me

Arrangement.text:
Chorus: Your love is [D]Better than life Your love is [Bm]better than life Your love is [Gmaj7]better than [Gmaj6]life to m[Asus A]e
Your love is [D]Better than life Your love is [Bm]better than life Your love is [Gmaj7]better than [Asus]life to m[D]e [Asus A]
{key:C} CHORUS: Better is [G2]one day in Your courts Better is [Asus]one day in Your house Better is [G2]one day in Your courts Than thousands [Asus]elsewhere, [(Repeat)] Thousands [D]elsewhere
VERSE 1: How [D]lovely is Your dwelling place, [G2] Oh Lord Al[Asus]mighty [D]My soul longs and even faints for [Asus] You For [D]here my heart is satisfied, [G2] within Your pr[Asus]esence I [D]sing beneath the shadow of Your [Asus]wings
VERSE 2: One [D]thing I ask and I would seek,[G2] to see Your [Asus]beauty To [D]find You in the place Your glory [Asus]dwells (repeat)
Arrangement.searchtext: chorus your love is better than life your love is better than life your love is better than life to me your love is better than life your love is better than life your love is better than life to me chorus better is one day in your courts better is one day in your house better is one day in your courts than thousands elsewhere thousands elsewhere verse 1 how lovely is your dwelling place oh lord almighty my soul longs and even faints for you for here my heart is satisfied within your presence i sing beneath the shadow of your wings verse 2 one thing i ask and i would seek to see your beauty to find you in the place your glory dwells repeat
